mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO doc_info
data_id, md5, name, description, author, type, url, http_method, content_type, is_folder, parent_id, module_id, is_use_global_headers, is_use_global_params, is_use_global_returns, is_request_array, is_response_array, request_array_type, response_array_type, create_mode, modify_mode, creator_id, creator_name, modifier_id, modifier_name, order_index, remark, is_show, gmt_create, gmt_modified,
#{dataId}, #{md5}, #{name}, #{description}, #{author}, #{type}, #{url}, #{httpMethod}, #{contentType}, #{isFolder}, #{parentId}, #{moduleId}, #{isUseGlobalHeaders}, #{isUseGlobalParams}, #{isUseGlobalReturns}, #{isRequestArray}, #{isResponseArray}, #{requestArrayType}, #{responseArrayType}, #{createMode}, #{modifyMode}, #{creatorId}, #{creatorName}, #{modifierId}, #{modifierName}, #{orderIndex}, #{remark}, #{isShow}, now(), now(),
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE md5 = VALUES(md5), name = VALUES(name), description = VALUES(description), author = VALUES(author), type = VALUES(type), url = VALUES(url), http_method = VALUES(http_method), content_type = VALUES(content_type), is_folder = VALUES(is_folder), parent_id = VALUES(parent_id), module_id = VALUES(module_id), is_use_global_headers = VALUES(is_use_global_headers), is_use_global_params = VALUES(is_use_global_params), is_use_global_returns = VALUES(is_use_global_returns), is_request_array = VALUES(is_request_array), is_response_array = VALUES(is_response_array), request_array_type = VALUES(request_array_type), response_array_type = VALUES(response_array_type), create_mode = VALUES(create_mode), modify_mode = VALUES(modify_mode), creator_id = VALUES(creator_id), creator_name = VALUES(creator_name), modifier_id = VALUES(modifier_id), modifier_name = VALUES(modifier_name), order_index = VALUES(order_index), remark = VALUES(remark), is_show = VALUES(is_show), is_deleted = 0, gmt_modified = now()
